If only everyone could understand my struggle... —A_Lumiknight
I don't pick fights with anyone... Unless they try to drag me down to their level. —A_Lumiknight
Reminder that this message board HIGHLY CLASSIFIED. Do not share anything posted here! —A_Lumiknight
We Lumiknights are above such crass concerns as amassing power. —A_Lumiknight
I've heard about the special recruit, but honestly I'm not impressed. —A_Lumiknight
How can some random person just INSTANTLY gain the trust of Allon and the Empress?? I have no words. —A_Lumiknight
It's good to have allies that recognize and respect your many talents. —A_Lumiknight
I keep hearing "hero" but all I see is "average". —A_Lumiknight
Skills are one thing, but talent and intellect are another entirely. I'm not convinced. —A_Lumiknight
If Allon trusts them so much, they should be capable of more than I've seen. —A_Lumiknight
I've heard this hero stopped Madria's invasion. Confirm/Deny? —A_Lumiknight
Actually, there are conflicting reports over who did what during the Siege of Tria. —A_Lumiknight
Tonight's menu includes braised demiporker, another fine suggestion from Mason! —ChefDeLumiknight
I was sure they would have washed out by now... But they just keep at it. —A_Lumiknight
I've got a reputation to consider. I won't waste time on trifles. —A_Lumiknight
I've got a big scoop cooking... I know why Allon and the Empress trusted that person. —A_Lumiknight
$MyPCName$? Oh, the one Allon talked about! Yeah, they're not bad. —A_Lumiknight
That person's s pretty good, but nothing compared to our Mason! —LumiknightAdvanced
Strong skills, positive attitude... They might not be half bad. —A_Lumiknight
Maybe Mason will take the newcomer under his wing! He's a great teacher! —Lumi_Squire
I guess if Allon says they can be trusted... —A_Lumiknight
I still have questions about the relationship between Empress Ereve and $MyPCName$. —A_Lumiknight
$MyPCName$ might be cut out for the Lumiknights... If Mason approves. —LumiknightAdvanced
I've heard a lot of talk about $MyPCName$ among the Lumiknights, almost as much as Mason. —LumiknightAdvanced
I think $MyPCName$ picked up some moves from me, they're quite skilled now. —A_Lumiknight
Mason and $MyPCName$... Can you imagine the team-up possibilities? —ChefDeLumiknight
I can't deny their skills. Almost as good as mine. —A_Lumiknight
I've heard the senior knights saying that $MyPCName$ should take lessons from Mason! —Lumi_Squire
I saw true bravery today... Almost as great as my own. I was moved. —A_Lumiknight
$MyPCName$ has potential... I would like to be the one to mold it. —A_Lumiknight
If $MyPCName$ follows in Mason's shoot how do i delete this no —A_Lumiknight
Someone accidentally logged into my account... Hope they didn't post anything strange... —A_Lumiknight
Any defender of Maple World deserves a chance with us, I think. —A_Lumiknight
After retiring from the Lumiknights, I trust Mason to identify the right people to ally with. —VintageLumiknight
Did $MyPCName$ get hit on that last mission? How disappointing... —A_Lumiknight
Maple World needs a true defender... Or two. Maybe $MyPCName$ can stand alongside me. —A_Lumiknight
$MyPCName$ could become an honorary Lumiknight, if Mason approves. —LumiknightAdvanced
Actually, $MyPCName$'s power is a similar but more mundane form of my own. Still nothing to sneeze at. —A_Lumiknight
I never back down from a fight. If $MyPCName$, they better not either. —A_Lumiknight
It's my honor to prepare food for Mason and those he deems worthy of it! —ChefDeLumiknight
My power is a terrible curse I've had to bear. I hope other "heroes" understand that kind of sacrifice. —A_Lumiknight
If $MyPCName$ keeps this up, they might be as great as Mason someday! —Lumi_Squire
I see hints of power similar to my own. I can only hope it is used responsibly. —A_Lumiknight
I've seen $MyPCName$ fight. Good, but always room for improvement. —A_Lumiknight
If Allon and Mason shoot i did it again cancel CANCEL —A_Lumiknight

Mason was wise to bring $MyPCName$ into the organization. —Lumiknights_Liverty
There are no baseless rumors. Every story must be examined for hints of truth. —A_Lumiknight
I will earn Allon and Mason's trust someday, just like $MyPCName$ is trying to do! —Lumi_Squire
Some people find shortcuts to trust. They should count themselves lucky. —A_Lumiknight
I agree with Mason that $MyPCName$ still has work to do to prove themselves! —Neo_Lumiknight
I hear $MyPCName$'s name wherever I go. Hopefully the public doesn't lose sight of what's important. —A_Lumiknight
Ability, bravery, belief, conscience... that person possesses all of that. I speak, of course, of Mason. —LumiTemple_Knight
Someday I hope to see more heroes like Mason, and $MyPCName$ might be that next generation. —LumiknightAdvanced
Mason was a big reason I joined the Lumiknights. I inspired I mean Mason and I come on how do i delete thissssssss —LumiknightAdvanced
Perhaps it is time I acknowledge $MyPCName$ as a peer. Perhaps. —A_Lumiknight
People worship the ground $MyPCName$ walks on... It's too much, if you ask me. —A_Lumiknight
With $MyPCName$ on our side, we'll go far. And I've got the plan to do it. —A_Lumiknight
Many Lumiknights look up to $MyPCName$. That's fine, as long as they don't forget my teachings. —A_Lumiknight
Discussion thread: How do we feel about $MyPCName$'s technique? —A_Lumiknight
I once saw $MyPCName$ eat a hot dog with ketchup. It's made it very hard to trust them, imo. —A_Lumiknight
Actions speak louder than words... and great power is the fuel for actions. That's a Mason Original. —A_Lumiknight
If I had to rate $MyPCName$... I guess I'd give them a 6/10? Shows promise, at least. —A_Lumiknight
I've heard the Madria was out of sorts on the day of the Tria invasion. What does $MyPCName$ have to say about that? —A_Lumiknight
Having $MyPCName$ join the Lumiknights would be a challenge for both sides. —A_Lumiknight
There's a lot of talk about $MyPCName$, but I don't see how anyone could dethrone Allon. —A_Lumiknight
I'm not going to say anything bad about the captain here... But if I did, I would say that he should be nicer to Mason. —Lumiknights_Ganis
Mason visited our branch and told us of $MyPCName$'s rise. I hope our knights follow in their footsteps. —Lumiknights_Caldera
$MyPCName$, I know you're out there, doing the best you can for all of us. Thank you. #Thankful —Empress_Ereve
I'm just saying, I don't think $MyPCName$ against me would be a fair fight. Don't @ me. —A_Lumiknight
How can anyone be as good and noble as $MyPCName$? Almost like they're hiding something, like Mason said... —LumiSquire
Our branch got in a copy of $MyPCName$: A Life of Questing, and it's always checked out... —Lumiknights_Shinduff
I've started seeing people PRAYING to images of $MyPCName$! Surely that's going too far! —A_Lumiknight
$MyPCName$, your service to the Empress has been invaluable. You have my utmost gratitude. —TheCaptainAllon
Starting to think that I might have been looking at this all wrong... —A_Lumiknight
Had a great chat with $MyPCName$ over last night's meal. Glad you're on our side! —ChefDeLumiknight
Wow what an echo chamber in here! $MyPCName$ is a real hero, can't you see that? —Lumiknight9000

We're with you, $MyPCName$! You've inspired people all over Maple World to come together! —UnityAlliance

$MyPCName$ is so good, they broke our message board lol —LumiSquire013
Together, we can take on Madria and her minions and whatever else they throw at us! —A_Lumiknight
I'm starting to think $MyPCName$ might be more famous than Allon someday, don't @ me. —LumiNate
Mason you coward make $MyPCName$ an honorary Lumiknight —LumiNate
